content: palmyra diamond wrap by suzy daisy boo creations *disclaimer* pattern copyright © daisy boo creations 2018 this pattern is licensed for unlimited personal use you are strictly prohibited from reproducing or selling this pattern the pattern may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full except for personal reference by purchasing this pattern you are granted a limited license to create items to be sold that are made from this pattern subject to the following conditions all items must include a credit to daisy boo creations including the pattern name and website www daisyboo net if you are unsure as to how this license affects you please contact suzy@daisyboo net materials for this wrap i used 1 yarn cake of scheepjes whirl in jumpin jaffa pop & tasty nom nom 3 5mm hook needle scissors abbreviations chain chain treble_crochet treble uk double_crochet us st stitch sts stitches space space fptr front post treble uk fpdc - front post double_crochet us bptr back post treble uk bpdc - back post double_crochet us v-st v_stitch treble_crochet double_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet double_crochet pattern this pattern is easily adjustable by adding on 14 or removing 14 sts i ve also made an integrated edging that changes colour along with the wrap itself to start chain 97 + 3 for your turning chain 1 in the 4th chain from the hook treble_crochet double_crochet in every chain you should have 98 sts in total turn 2 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st miss the next st make a v-st treble_crochet double_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet double_crochet miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the following st bptr bpdc in the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 5 sts *chain 4 miss 4 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 10 sts* repeat from * to * 4 times chain 4 miss the next 4 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 5 sts bptr bpdc in the next treble_crochet double_crochet in the following st miss the next st make a v-st in the next st miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn 3 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st miss the next st make a v st in the chain space of the v st below miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the following st fptr fpdc in the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts *chain 2 miss the next st and the 1st chain make 1 treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd and 3rd chain chain 2 miss the last chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 8 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the next st and the 1st chain make 1 treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd and 3rd chain chain 2 miss the last chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the following 4 sts fptr double_crochet
